extendedInfo.description: Price now reduced to $6.99 from $9.99!With a focus on prioritization type questions, and developing subject matter expertise, Upward Mobilityâs NCLEX-RN Exam Prep app for Android is a valuable tool to help you pass this important exam.Your satisfaction is important to us and we have a no questions asked refund policy for all our Android apps. We encourage you to try our application out risk free and let us know by e-mailing info@upwardpro.com if there are any issues.As part of our social mission of making quality health care education more universally affordable, we are making this app available for $6.99, off from the normal price of $9.99.This practice exam/review module contains 780 simulated exam questions written exclusively for Upward Mobility by professional writers with concise, but detailed explanations to help you prepare for this test.Topics include:-Safe and Effective Care Environment Questions-Health Promotion and Maintenance Questions-Psychosocial Integrity Questions-Physiological Integrity QuestionsUpward Mobility apps are designed with an exclusive intuitive UI. They provide a Study Mode, where questions are paired with clear explanations and the user can proceed at their own pace, as well as a Test Mode designed to simulate the exam experience, where the user can set question and time restraints and their results are presented to them upon completion in both an aggregate and a question-by-question format.About the NCLEX ExamNCLEX (National Council Licensure EXamination) is an examination for the licensing of nurses in the United States. The NCLEX is administered by the National Council of State Boards of Nursing.Upward Mobility is not affiliated with nor is this app endorsed by the NCSBN.About Upward MobilityUpward Mobility is an independent test preparation and management education apps company that creates high quality material that is witty and engaging, perfect for on-the-go students and ambitious professionals. All of our content is developed exclusively for Upward Mobility by subject matter expert writers and undergoes a thorough review process.Customer satisfaction is our top priority, and if you have any questions or comments or are unsatisfied with our products in any way, please contact us at info@upwardpro.com and we will do our best to help you.We are a double bottom line company that is committed to education in the developing world. Some of the profits will be used to deploy education via mobile phone in emerging countries to improve their total factor productivity growth.

reviews.title: Needs edited
reviews.comment: There are quite a few questions with incorrect answers, answers that do not match rationales (ie-you have to select AB a the universal donor to get to the rationale explaining why O is the correct answer), select all that apply do not work, some questions are wrong. It really needs edited so that at least you aren\'t getting misinformation even if the spelling is not fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sarah
reviews.comment: I use this app a lot and love it! Wish the rationals were a little more detailed, but still helps me a lot preparing for boards!

reviews.title: Passed my NCLEX
reviews.comment: Good to use on the go. I like that you can make the tests as many questions.

reviews.comment: Good app. Questions are now in categories. Only flaw is sometimes they show the right answer as wrong, but when it shows rationales they\'re right.

reviews.comment: Questions are good, but it should have categories so you can study what you are studying in class.

reviews.comment: Takes forever to load on my Droid Incredible. Not many testing options. No updates. Wish the Kaplan one was available when I bought this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app but I wish you could view rationales in the test mode and not just study mode. Makes no sense to study and memorize and then test.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow....some of the best nclex questions I have seen out of all my study materials. Can\'t beat for the price!!!!
